en.q: What is the purpose of a CPU in a computer?
en.a: The CPU processes instructions and performs calculations, acting as the main controller of the system.

en.q: Why do objects fall to the ground?
en.a: Because of gravity, a force that pulls objects with mass toward each other.

en.q: What is a budget in personal finance?
en.a: A budget is a plan that tracks income and expenses to help manage money effectively.

en.q: What does HTTPS mean on a website?
en.a: HTTPS indicates that the site uses encryption to secure data sent between the browser and server.

en.q: What is the function of mitochondria in a cell?
en.a: Mitochondria generate energy in the form of ATP, powering cellular processes.
